attributes.action: Enoble Lewis Hamilton at the earliest opportunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lewis Hamilton is a TRUE BRITISH HERO.

The BBC, ITV and The Sun have all said that this is the case and, despite my previous belief in the definition of HERO, I stand corrected.

I reckon them X Factor folk should be giving their charity money record to Hhamilton instead of the Help The Heroes charity and the Royal British Legion Poppy Appeal.

After all, what have those lazy bandit, so-called 'war heroes' done in the last sixty years, eh?

Nothing, unlike Hamilton who has single handedly brought restored the Great to Great Britain from his Swiss tax exile home, by driving a car in circles.

Is there any way we can fast track an ennoblement?

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
